install.author: Wijiti

install.description: The JSolr Virtuemart Search maps a virtuemart product to a generic result.

param.name: jsolr_show_all_currencies
param.label: Show prices in all currencies
param.description: Show results in all currencies or restrict results based on the language to currency code mapping.

param.name: jsolr_default_currency
param.label: Default Currency
param.description: The default currency to use if a mapping cannot be found for the language.

param.name: jsolr_currency_mapping
param.label: Language to Currency
param.description: A list of languages mapped to corresponding currency codes.
